monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Burns vines - Enkindles torches - Activates fire orbs
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: If a single hit deals more than 25% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), gain 8 Charge stacks. (Once per attack)

skills.name: Buff Catalyst
skills.description: Buffs are 20% more effective on this Monster.

skills.name: Dark Instinct
skills.description: Increases damage dealt by 20%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Double Impact
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, trigger an additional 50% damage hit.

skills.name: Eternal Heart
skills.description: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.

skills.name: Exploit
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, gain a random Buff and shield self by 10% of Max Health.

skills.name: Explosion
skills.description: 1 x 220% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 275% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 340% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 425% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosion Lvl 5
skills.description: 1 x 530% physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Explosive Blast
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 220% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fire Affinity
skills.description: Fire attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Fire Breath
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Removes 1 Buff from targets - Applies a random Buff to whole party

skills.name: Fire Pillar
skills.description: 3 x 200% (600%) magical damage (fire) applies Sorcery, Regeneration & Spellshield (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Fireball
skills.description: 1 x 230% magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 285% magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 355% magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 435% magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Lvl 5
skills.description: 1 x 540% magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Storm
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 100% (400%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 125% (500%) magical damage (fire)

skills.name: First Impact
skills.description: Increases the base damage of the first hit of an attack by an additional 40% of Attack (physical) or Magic (magical). (25% for mass attacks)

skills.name: Flamestrike
skills.description: 1 x 130% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flamestrike Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 170% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flamestrike Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 225% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flamestrike Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 290% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Killing Dance
skills.description: Whenever this Monster knocks an enemy out, it gains 3 Charge stacks and it regains half of the Charge stacks it used up during the attack.

skills.name: Magic Barrier
skills.description: Aura: All Mage Monster in the party start the combat with a shield equal to 150% of their Max Mana and receive 1% less damage for every 100 Max Mana.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Powered Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 150% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Funnel
skills.description: Before an action, there is 10% chance for every 100 Max Mana to gain Might and Sorcery. This monster can receive one additional stack of Might and Sorcery.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Meteorite Shower
skills.description: 2 x 175% (350%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Shield all allies for 1 x (700 + 150% Attack)

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 200% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Toxic Slam
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%
